direction.label: Horizontal/Vertical
direction.description: Whether the buttons should be Horizontal or Vertical

activeColor.label: Active Color
activeColor.description: Color of the button when it's selected

inactiveColor.label: Inactive Color
inactiveColor.description: Color of the button when it's selected not selected

contentColor.label: Selected Content Color
contentColor.description: Color of the content(Icon and Label)

unselectedContentColor.label: Unselected Content Color
unselectedContentColor.description: Unfinished Color of the content(Icon and Label)

labelStyle.label: Label Style
labelStyle.description: Font and weight of the Label

borderRadius.label: Border Radius
borderRadius.description: The border radius for the container or options

iconSize.label: Icon Size
iconSize.description: The size of the icon if enabled

fieldName.label: Field name
fieldName.description: The name of the field within the screen that will store this component's value
